name: bitcoin (2015 Wrapper) (Meme)
description: Ethereum was released on July 30th, 2015. On November 3rd, 2015, bitcoin - the first ERC20 meme coin was created only 6h after Mistcoin. The token featured a capped supply of 21 million and was initially distributed among Ethereum developers and Reddit users. Furthermore, a historic milestone was achieved with the inaugural exchange, where 1 million bitcoin tokens were swapped for 10 Ether.
